snippet: Aryca, a Chinese company, modified a pair of swimming goggles to include a watertight chamber that encloses an iPhone.
abstract: Aryca, a Chinese company, modified a pair of swimming goggles to include a watertight chamber that encloses an iPhone.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS -- Strap on these goofy goggles and you can videotape your adventures under the sea with your iPhone.

headline.main: Goggles That Take Your iPhone Under the Sea
